title: Certified Nursing Assistant CNA Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Owensboro Health (Owensboro, KY)
Interview Descriptions: Everyone was very nice and explained things thoroughly. They do a physical, urine drug screening, check your vision, and fit you for an N95 mask. Be prepared to fill out a bunch of paperwork.

title: Certified Nursing Assistant CNA Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Owensboro Health in May 2022
Interview Descriptions: The process was fast, but some of the questions were critical thinking. You will be interviewed by 2-3 other nurses within the floor or unit. Toward the end, you will have a chance to ask questions.
Interview Questions: Why should we hire you? Tell me one thing that others have said they don't like about your work ethic

title: Internship Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Owensboro Health (Evansville, IN)
Interview Descriptions: Very warm and friendly, two way discussion in which the possibility of interning for the company was highlighted. With never having met with the company before, it felt as though I already knew them anyways.
Interview Questions: What previous experience do you have?

title: Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Owensboro Health (Owensboro, KY)
Interview Descriptions: Quick and well maintained by HR. I applied and got a call in about 3-5 days. They scheduled the interview and were flexible. I immediately liked the culture of Owensboro Health. It was a panel interview but it was not overwhelming. They responded to me in about a week with an offer that was very competitive and I accepted.

title: Admissions Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Owensboro Health
Interview Descriptions: I applied online.  Then a recruiter called me for a short interview.  A week later I went in for a face to face interview.  Mostly behavioral questions.  It was pleasant and friendly.
Interview Questions: How would you deal with an irate patient or customer?

title: Certified Nursing Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Owensboro Health (Owensboro, KY) in Nov 2016
Interview Descriptions: I received a call a month after I applied for an interview and it took about a week for me to find out I got the job. There were several people in my interview so it made things a little stressful but it went well overall.
Interview Questions: What is a good reason to call into work?

title: CNA Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Owensboro Health (Owensboro, KY) in Oct 2016
Interview Descriptions: It was really straight forward and to the point. They asked basic interview questions and asked my avaliblity. Offered me the job without any experience. Interviewers were really nice. They called back that afternoon to offer me the job
Interview Questions: What hours would you be able to work?

title: Administration Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Owensboro Health
Interview Descriptions: They bypass experienced people and hire people in their network with less experience.   This is discriminatory hiring practices and it starts with the recruiters.  They are the gatekeepers to you getting reviewed by managers.  They don't recognize good talent.   What a shame. .

title: CNA Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Owensboro Health (Owensboro, KY) in Jan 2014
Interview Descriptions: Interview with the manager or supervisor. Then it will take 2-3 weeks process they will call your previous jobs and references.t's always hard to know what to expect when going in for that interview -- and preparation can make all the difference
Interview Questions:
Behavioral Type Questions
Tell us about a time..
Tell us about yourself

title: Supervisor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Owensboro Health in Oct 2012
Interview Descriptions: I was called back for an interview rather quickly.  I had two interviews total.  The first was with the  hiring manager and was more of a "get to know you" meeting. The second interview was with a panel of supervisors and managers that asked typical questions about the position.
